ygData.subject: Re: DR Question from Ryan
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah.. I still play DR now.. I have only been in the realms for about a year and a half... and It is going down hill very fast.. Its just to the point where it
ygData.messageBody:
Ah.. I still play DR now.. I have only been in the realms for about a year
and a half... and It is going down hill very fast.. Its just to the point
where it is so boring now.. they did all these changes that just hurt the
game.. Hopefully EQ doesnt do that.. I dont know if ya ever knew me but I
was Natu.. if ya didnt figure that out from my E-mail...

Natu


----- Original Message -----
From: Darrell Runyan <runyan@...>
To: EQCheats <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 5:30 PM
Subject: [EQCheats] DR Question from Ryan


> From: Darrell Runyan <runyan@...>
>
> From: "Ryan" <Natu@...>
> Subject: Re: Skill Changes
>
>
> Who were you in DR?
>
>
> Ryan,
>
> I played Hawkford Aspenglen two and a half years. The last year Hawk
> was married to Damaria, the empath. I gave Hawk and my cleric, Nirin,
> to Erefayna's player and she's having fun with them now.
>
> Darrell
